---
title: "COVID-19 Dashboard"
output: 
  flexdashboard::flex_dashboard:
    orientation: columns
    vertical_layout: fill
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
covid <- read_csv("data/covid_testing.csv")
covid_clean <- covid %>%
  filter(pan_day >= 0)
```

Column {data-width=650}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Test Volumes Over Time

```{r}
ggplot(data = covid_clean, mapping = aes(x = pan_day)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "count")
```

Column {data-width=350}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### In Lab Turnaround Times

```{r}
ggplot(covid_clean) +
  geom_point(mapping = aes(x = pan_day, y = rec_ver_tat))
```

### Distribution of Cycle Threshold Values

```{r}
covid_positive <- covid_clean %>%
  filter(result == "positive")
ggplot(data = covid_positive, mapping = aes(x = ct_value)) +
  geom_histogram()
```
